DOC.brief_summary: Context : This first multi-site randomize control study effectiveness group treatment war-exposed adolescent deliver in-country within public school system . Objective : To evaluate effectiveness trauma/grief-focused group treatment program reducing symptom posttraumatic stress disorder ( PTSD ) , depression , traumatic grief war-exposed Bosnian youth attend 10 secondary school locate Central Bosnia .
DOC.brief_title: Randomized Controlled Trial Effectiveness Group Treatment With War-Exposed Bosnian Adolescents
DOC.detailed_description: Design : A randomized control trial conduct 2000-2001 school year , 4-month follow-up , compare group treatment psychoeducation/skill-based school milieu intervention . Setting Participants : Students attend 10 Bosnian secondary school expose severe trauma , traumatic loss , severe adversity , report severe persisting symptom PTSD , depression , traumatic grief , functional impairment . Intervention : Students randomly assign either 17-session Trauma Grief Component Therapy ( n=71 ) , school milieu intervention ( n=73 ) , conduct trained school counselor .
